title: Mastery Emote Taken Away Early

embed.description: Forge destiny with Dawnbringer Riven and Nightbringer Yasuo by playing missions, crafting tokens, and determining a winner.

body:
Clearly says we have until midnight, 3am my time to spam the emote.
 I wanted to get a nice screenshot with a friend but riot took it out early? 

Wouldn't be the first time they go back on their word.
Hopefully it's just a glitch,riot?

replies.body: I found the problem. You can't flash it in a custom game. Any chance we could have this enabled so I can take a screenshot in a custom?
The emote should be active for a while longer.  Do you have the summoner icon equipped?
